articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Greetings to President of Council of Ministers of Cuba
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Greetings to President of Council of Ministers of Cuba
 Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, Sunday sent a message of greeting to Raul Castro Ruz, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba, president of the Council of State and president of the Council of Ministers of Cuba.
					 The message said:
					
					 I extend warm congratulations and comradely greetings to you and, through you, to all the Cuban people on the occasion of the 59th anniversary of the victory of the Cuban revolution.
					
					 I sincerely wish you good health and bigger success in your responsible work for leading the Cuban party, government and people, expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries with long history and tradition will invariably grow strong.

articles.title: New Year's Cards to Kim Jong Un from Foreign State and Party Leaders
articles.content:
New Year's Cards to Kim Jong Un from Foreign State and Party Leaders
 Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received New Year's cards from state and party leaders and personages of different countries on the occasion of the New Year Juche 107 (2018).
					 They are the president of the Lao People's Democratic Republic, the president of the Russian Federation, the president of the People's Republic of China who is general secretary of the C.C., Communist Party of China, the president of the Islamic Republic of Pakistan, the president of Turkmenistan, the president of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam, the general secretary of the C.C., Communist Party of Vietnam, the chairman of "A Just Russia", the secretary general of the People's Party for the Reconstruction and the Democracy of DR Congo, the national secretary of the Socialist Workers' Party of United States of America, the executive director of the WFP, the director general of the World Intellectual Property Organization and the mayor of Khabarovsk of the Russian Federation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Greetings from President of Palestine
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Greetings from President of Palestine
 Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, on Dec. 24 received a message of greeting from Mahmoud Abbas, president of the State of Palestine and chairman of the Executive Committee of the Palestine Liberation Organization.
					 The message sincerely wished Kim Jong Un good health and happiness and the friendly DPRK and its people sustainable stability and prosperity, extending the warmest congratulations to Kim Jong Un on behalf of the State of Palestine and its people and president on the occasion of the New Year 2018.
					
					 The message hoped that the New Year would be a year of wellbeing, love and peace for the world people and a year when the people of Palestine would found an independent state with eastern Kuds as its capital, which is the city of reconciliation, co-existence and peace - the sure guarantee for gaining their freedom and ensuring peace desired by all of us.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Iranian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Iranian President
 Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, on Dec. 26 received a message of greeting from Hassan Rouhani, president of the Islamic Republic of Iran.
					 The message extended greetings to Kim Jong Un and the Korean people on the occasion of the New Year 2018.
					
					 It hoped that global peace, justice and equality would be ensured and violence removed in the New Year.
					
					 It wished Kim Jong Un good health and success in his work and the Korean people happiness and prosperity, hoping that the new year would be a year full of blessings and happiness.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Sudan
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Sudan
Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Sunday sent a message of greeting to Omar Hassan Ahmed Al-Bashir, president of Sudan, on the occasion of the 62nd anniversary of its independence.
					Expressing belief that the long-standing friendly relations between the two countries would grow strong in the mutual interests, the message wished the president and the government of Sudan success in their work for safeguarding the sovereignty of the country and achieving its peace, stability and prosperity.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from President of DR Congo
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from President of DR Congo
 Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, on Dec. 12 received a message of greeting from Joseph Kabila Kabange, president of the Democratic Republic of Congo.
					 The message extended the warm congratulations and sincere best wishes to Kim Jong Un on behalf of all the people and the president of DR Congo on the occasion of the New Year 2018.
					
					 It expressed the will to further develop the friendly and cooperative relations of mutual benefit between the two countries for the sake of the wellbeing of the two peoples on this happy occasion.
					
					 It paid high tribute to Kim Jong Un, once again wishing him good health and big success in his work for leading the DPRK.

articles.title: Fireworks Displayed in Pyongyang on New Year
articles.content:
Fireworks Displayed in Pyongyang on New Year
 Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Fireworks were displayed in the sky over Pyongyang on the New Year, Juche 107 (2018).
					 Working citizens from all walks of life and school youth and children thronged banks of the River Taedong near Kim Il Sung Square and the Tower of the Juche Idea to watch fireworks gala on Sunday evening.
					
					 At 00:00 of January 1, 2018, song "Our Leader Loved by People" resounded, along with the start of the fireworks. Such letters reading "A Happy New Year" were displayed with fireworks.
					
					 Watching the fireworks, the onlookers looked back upon with proud the year 2017 when the Korean people made a dynamic advance toward the victory of socialism, rallied as one in mind around the ever-victorious Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Pyongyang Ice Sculpture Festival-2018 Opens
articles.content:
Pyongyang Ice Sculpture Festival-2018 Opens
 Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Ice Sculpture Festival-2018 opened at Kim Il Sung Square on Sunday on the occasion of the New Year.
					 On display at the festival venue are scores of ice sculptures on various themes presented by the State Planning Commission, the Ministry of Land and Maritime Transport, the Ministry of Railways, the Art Studio of the Korean People's Army, Pyongyang Jang Chol Gu University of Commerce and other units.
					
					 Those ice sculptures depicting Mt Paektu and the Arch of Triumph impressively show the army and people's deep yearning and reverence for President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who devoted all their life to the accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 There are also sculptures portraying Ryomyong Street and ICBMs soaring into space and showing the revolutionary faith of the heroic Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il working class.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Baskets to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Ya. T. Nobichenko, an internationalist soldier, and Jong Il Sim, widow of DPRK Hero An Tong Su, sent floral baskets to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on the occasion of the New Year Juche 107 (2018).
					 The baskets were placed before the statues on Sunday.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Bereaved Family of DPRK Hero
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Bereaved Family of DPRK Hero
 Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from Jong Il Sim, widow of DPRK Hero An Tong Su, Sunday on the occasion of the New Year Juche 107 (2018).

articles.title: Congratulations to Chad FM
articles.content:
Congratulations to Chad FM
 Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Ri Yong Ho, minister of Foreign Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, on Dec. 29 sent a congratulatory message to Mahamat Zene Cherif upon his appointment as minister of Foreign Affairs, African Integration and International Cooperation of the Republic of Chad.
					 Expressing belief that the long-standing relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger, the message wished him success in his new job.

articles.title: DPRK Is Certain to Win Final Victory of Juche Cause: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK Is Certain to Win Final Victory of Juche Cause: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- So long as there are ever-victorious leadership of the great Party and the army and people single-mindedly united around the Party, no one can prevent the advance of the DPRK and it is sure to win a final victory in the struggle for accomplishing the Juche cause, says Rodong Sinmun in an article Sunday.
					 The invincible might of the Workers' Party of Korea are more strikingly displayed in the fierce showdown with imperialism and the U.S. for protecting the sovereignty of the country and nation, the article says, adding:
					
					 Frightened by the ever-growing might of the DPRK, the U.S. and its vassal forces go more frantic with the most barbarous sanctions and most vicious military threat and blackmail.
					
					 Any provocation move of the U.S. imperialists against the DPRK can not shock the DPRK.
					
					 Today's tremendous power of the DPRK and its highest strategic position clearly prove the invincible might of the Workers' Party of Korea demonstrating its might as a model of revolutionary parties.
					
					 The army and people single-mindedly united around the great Party is the invincible might guaranteeing the final victory of our cause.
					
					 The ardent desire of all the service personnel and people identical with the Party in idea and intention serves as the foundation of the conviction of victory in our cause, and the miraculous strength of the people which creates a thing out of nothing in hearty response to the Party's calls serves as the great power of self-reliance and self-development with which they win on all fronts of socialist construction.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK are more firmly united behind the Party in the grim situation and go firmer in their will to bring earlier the victory of morrow through their dynamic advance.

articles.title: U.S. Military Attack upon DPRK Will Lead to Self-Destruction: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Military Attack upon DPRK Will Lead to Self-Destruction: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Trump claimed that all military options were on the table when making public the report on "national security strategy" recently, Timed to coincide with this, McMaster, national security advisor at the White House, told BBC that the U.S. has to get ready to realize the DPRK's denuclearization by force in case of need.
					 Inspecting U.S. military bases, U.S. Secretary of Defense Mattis also spouted that the U.S. military action will be the worst day for the DPRK and it is necessary to cope with the outbreak of a war.
					
					 This is nothing but last-ditch efforts of the weak who keenly felt a real flop in a nuclear conflict with the DPRK, Rodong Sinmun says in a commentary Sunday.
					
					 Unaware of the fact that its rival has turned into a strategic state capable of posing substantial nuclear threat to the U.S., the Trump group attempts to apply military force to it, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 It would be well advised to cool its head heated with fever of invasion and think twice about why there has never been a war among nuclear powers until now and what happens if such war breaks out.
					
					 If the U.S. turns blind eyes to the hard reality and dares pounce upon the DPRK, the latter will clearly show the world who will be torn to shreds in the centuries-long standoff with the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. military attack upon the DPRK precisely means its self-destruction.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Sycophancy and Servility of S. Korean Authorities
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Sycophancy and Servility of S. Korean Authorities
 Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities have flattered outsiders without their own viewpoint only to bring disgrace and damage to themselves and drive themselves into a tight corner, says Rodong Sinmun in an article Sunday.
					 This is illustrated by the fact that Trump lately made public a new "national security strategy" based on "America first", the article says, adding:
					
					 The south Korean chief executive agreed on the "four-point principles" during his tour of neighboring countries.
					
					 However, paying no regard to the viewpoint of his stooge, Trump made sure that the report of the strategy includes such words as "pressing ahead with the denuclearization of the Korean peninsula" and "the preparation of the overwhelming muscle".
					
					 The south Korean chief executive is driven into a piteous plight as his American master's "national security strategy" is contrary to the diplomatic and security policy pursued by south Korea.
					
					 Trump forced the puppet forces to join in the missile defense system and the establishment of triangular military alliance. Under such situation the south Korean authorities face the dilemma as they promised the neighboring country that they would not do three things.
					
					 The puppet forces planed to enforce the "new northern policy" and "new southern policy" towards the neighboring nations, crying out for what they called "diversified diplomacy". But those policies are hardly expected to be enforced as they run counter to the "national security strategy" of Trump who betrayed his black-hearted ambition to push forward with the "India-Pacific strategy" on a full scale with the neighboring counties after defining those countries as the biggest competitive states.
					
					 The south Korean authorities would be well advised to make a proper option between the two fates: the one that they are ruined by sycophancy and servility and the other that they follow the road of independence though belatedly.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Denounced for Following U.S. Policy to Stifle DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Denounced for Following U.S. Policy to Stifle DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities, who repeatedly touted "ruling out a war," firstly expressed "support" for the "sanctions resolution" of the UN and launched propaganda about the crude "feats". This is the revelation of the sinister intention to realize their ambition for invading the north with the backing of the U.S., Minju Joson Sunday says in a commentary.
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 The south Korean puppet authorities shamelessly vociferate about "dialogue and peace". However, can they calm down the strong criticism at home and abroad with such foolish farce?
					
					 The puppet authorities suffer an insult and cold treatment, being subject to contempt by the international community owing to the submission to the U.S. They have not yet presumed the horrible ruin entailed by the U.S. and its vassal forces' sanctions, pressure and military provocation against the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, a world nuclear power, but run amuck.
					
					 The anti-DPRK sanctions block dialogue and disturb peace only. The former pro-U.S. conservative regime met a miserable end, forsaken by mindset of the people, as it took advantage of the U.S. sanctions against the DPRK.
					
					 The south Korean authorities have still followed the U.S. policy to stifle the DPRK, far from drawing a lesson from the miserable end of the predecessor. This is a foolish behavior of bringing about dread self-destruction.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should follow the trend of the times from the stand of the national independence, coming to their senses, though belatedly.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced in Italy
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced in Italy
 Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- The full text of leader Kim Jong Il's work "On Some Questions in Understanding the Juche Philosophy" was carried by the December issue of the Italian magazine La Voce on the occasion of the 6th anniversary of his demise.
					 The work, published on April 2, Juche 63 (1974), deals with the fact that the Juche philosophy is the man-centered philosophy which posed a new main issue of philosophy centered on man and clarified the opinion, viewpoint and attitude on the world and the difference between the Juche philosophy and human philosophy.

articles.title: DPRK Anniversaries Marked Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK Anniversaries Marked Abroad
 Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries to mark the sixth anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il and the 26th anniversary of his assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army, the sixth anniversary of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's assumption of the KPA supreme commandership and the 100th birth anniversary of the anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk.
					 Remembrance meetings, seminars, rallies, lectures, book and photo exhibitions and film shows were held in France, Britain, Spain, South Africa, Mexico and Peru from Dec. 5 to 17.
					
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos dealing with the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display there were their works, and books and photos introducing the successes registered by the service personnel and people of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					
					 "DPRK Tells with Bitter Tears" and other Korean films were shown.
					
					 The chairman of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and other speakers said that although there were many great men and leaders, the history did not know such outstanding leader as Kim Jong Il who devoted himself to the people.
					
					 The chairman of the Mfumalanga Provincial Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of South Africa praised Kim Jong Il as the great man who glorified the DPRK as a unique country in the world which is single-heartedly united and turned it into the military power with tremendous capabilities.
					
					 The general secretary of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico praised the DPRK for demonstrating its might as the world military power under the leadership of the respected Supreme Leader.
					
					 The chairperson of the Peruvian Association for the Study of Revolutionary Activities of Comrade Kim Jong Suk said the greatest feat of Kim Jong Suk was that she defended Kim Il Sung at the risk of her life in the battlefields during the anti-Japanese war. She lives in the hearts of Korean people as a woman commander of guerillas, the anti-Japanese war heroine and the mother of Korea for all ages, the chairperson added.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised Abroad
 Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Lectures and round-table talks were held in Romania, Ukraine, France, Guinea, Nigeria and Uganda from Dec. 8 to 16 in commemoration of the sixth anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there were personages of the Socialist Party of Romania, the Association for the Study of the Juche Idea in Lvov, Ukraine, the France-Korea Friendship Association, the Commando Force of the Defense Ministry of Guinea, the agro-stock farm in Nasarawa State of Nigeria, Kitante Primary School in Kampala City of Uganda and other units and masses.
					
					 The chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania who doubles as chairman of the Romanian Committee for Remembering Comrade Kim Jong Il said in a lecture:
					
					 Comrade Kim Jong Il performed precious exploits to be recorded long in the history of the struggle for smashing the imperialists' moves to stifle the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and leading socialism to victory.
					
					 He developed the Workers' Party of Korea into the revolutionary party in which the ideo-leadership system of the leader has been thoroughly established and the mother party serving the people and saw to it that all the service personnel and people hasten the building of a socialist power under the leadership of the Party.
					
					 The chairman of the Association for the Study of the Juche Idea in Lvov, Ukraine said that Kim Jong Il devoted all his life to the country and nation.
					
					 The chairman of the France-Korea Friendship Association highly praised Kim Jong Il for firmly protecting sovereignty of the country and dignity of the nation and laying the strong foundation for building a socialist power with his outstanding idea and leadership.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de felicitacion a Raul Castro Ruz
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de felicitacion a Raul Castro Ruz 
Pyongyang, 31 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio el dia 31 un mensaje de felicitacion a Raul Castro Ruz, Primer Secretario del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de Cuba y Presidente de los Consejos de Estado y de Ministros de la Republica de Cuba.
					En su misiva el Maximo Dirigente dio las calurosas felicitaciones y el saludo camaraderil al destinatario y, por su conducto, a todo el pueblo cubano en ocasion del 59o aniversario del triunfo de la Revolucion Cubana.
					
					Y expreso la conviccion de que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises con larga historia y tradicion se consolidaran y se desarrollaran invariablemente y le deseo de todo corazon al destinatario la buena salud y mayores exitos en sus responsabilidades de conducir al Partido, el gobierno y el pueblo de Cuba.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe tarjetas de Ano Nuevo provenientes de varios paises
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe tarjetas de Ano Nuevo provenientes de varios paises
Pyongyang, 31 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un recibio las tarjetas del Ano Nuevo que le dedicaran los jefes de Estado y partidos y personalidades de diferentes estratos de varios paises, con motivo del Ano Nuevo, 107 (2018) de la Era Juche.
					  Entre los remitentes figuran el presidente de la Republica Democratica Popular Lao, el presidente de la Federacion Rusa, el secretario general del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China y presidente de la Republica Popular China, el presidente de la Republica Islamica de Pakistan, el presidente de Turkmenistan, el presidente de la Republica Socialista de Vietnam, el secretario general del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de Vietnam, el presidente del Partido por la Justicia de Rusia, el secretario general del Partido Popular por la Reconstruccion y la Democracia del Congo Democratico y el secretario nacional del Partido de Obreros Socialistas de Estados Unidos, el director ejecutivo del Programa Mundial de Alimento, el director general de la Organizacion Mundial de la Propiedad Intelectual (WIPO en ingles) y el alcalde de Jabarovsk de la Federacion Rusa.

articles.title: Se lanzan los fuegos artificiales por el Ano Nuevo
articles.content:
Se lanzan los fuegos artificiales por el Ano Nuevo
Pyongyang, 31 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar en esta capital el disparo de fuegos artificiales en ocasion del Ano Nuevo, 107 (2018) de la Era Juche.
					  En ambas partes del rio Taedong cerca de la Plaza 
					
					Kim Il Sung y el Monumento a la idea Juche estaban concentrados los trabajadores de distintos estratos y los jovenes y ninos escolares agrupados para contemplar las salvas que muestran el luminoso futuro de la patria floreciente.
					
					  A la hora cero del 2018, se tiraron las salvas de diferentes colores describiendo las letras "Feliz Ano Nuevo" en el cielo en medio de sonar "Nuestro dirigente adorado por el pueblo".
					
					  Contemplando las chispas, los habitantes recordaron con orgullo el ano pasado en que vino avanzando energeticamente hacia el triunfo del socialismo uniendose monoliticamente en torno al invencible Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					
					  Reflejando la maximo gloria y agradecimiento de los militares y civiles al Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un quien abre la nueva epoca de la potencia con la destacada y habil direccion, subieron al cielo las chispas de tipo de ramo de flores.
					
					  Expresando la conviccion del pueblo coreano que avanza hacia la victoria final con el espiritu firme de la Corea del Juche, las chispas de diversos colores adornaron el cielo de la noche y se sonaron la cancion "Mi patria llena de esperanzas" y otras.

articles.title: Inaugurado Festival de Esculturas de Hielo de Pyongyang-2018
articles.content:
Inaugurado Festival de Esculturas de Hielo de Pyongyang-2018
Pyongyang, 31 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del Ano Nuevo, quedo inaugurado el dia 31 en la Plaza Kim Il Sung el Festival de Esculturas de Hielo de Pyongyang - 2018.
					  Alli, se ven decenas de esculturas de hielo expuestas por el Comite Estatal de Planificacion, el Ministerio de Transporte Terrestre y Maritimo, el Ministerio del Ferrocarril, la Casa de Creacion del Ejercito Popular de Corea, la Universidad de Comercio Jang Chol Gu de Pyongyang y otras unidades.
					
					  Estas obras escultoricas que describen el monte Paektu y el Arco de Triunfo demuestran emocionantemente la anoranza y veneracion del ejercito y pueblo coreanos a los grandes Lideres Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il quines dedicaron toda su vida por el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche.
					
					  Otras esculturas de hielo que describen la avenida Ryomyong levantada como monumental del la epoca del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y otros muestran la verdad de que no hay en este mundo las fuerzas que pueden detener la marcha victorioso de la Corea del Juche.
					
					  Viendo la escultura de hilo que describio los cohetes balisticos intercontinentales subiendo a espacio, la gente recordo con orgullo el ano emocionante que demostro plenamente el poderio inagotable de la Corea del Juche bajo la bandera de la linea de desarrollo paralelo.
					
					  Tambien, se ven las obras que reflejan la conviccion revolucionaria de la heroica clase obrera de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il de lograr el gran salto e innovacion en la construccion de la potencia economica socialista bajo la bandera de autofortalecimiento.

articles.title: Seleccionados mejores jugadores y entrenadores de 2017
articles.content:
Seleccionados mejores jugadores y entrenadores de 2017
Pyongyang, 31 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Los 10 mejores jugadores e igual numero de entrenadores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea para el ano 2017 son los siguientes:
					Jugadores:
					
					1. Kim Kuk Hyang, jugadora de salto a agua del Conjunto Deportivo 25 de Abril
					
					2. Kim Mi Rae, jugadora de salto a agua del Conjunto Deportivo Ryongnamsan
					
					3. Hyon Il Myong, jugador de salto a agua del Conjunto Deportivo 25 de Abril
					
					4. Kim Son Hyang, luchadora del Conjunto Deportivo del Ministerio de Relaciones Economicas con el Extranjero
